articles.description: It might sound utopian at a time when England faces a severe social housing shortage, but if you're a council house tenant you can move anywhere in the country and it won’t cost a penny
articles.content: The idea of trading places with another person is enduring in its appeal. Who wouldnt want to try another life on for size and see what its like to live in the city as opposed to the countryside? To … [+7322 chars]
